divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting ready for bed when there appeared to be light outside, so I went and looked. I didn't see any light source, but what I did see was a shock. There were three round dense white clouds in the middle of a starry sky making a very large perfect triangle. To the right of me there was a front approaching with clouds. Over a few minutes one of the three circles got sheared apart and disappeared, leaving the other two slowly drifting. My personal theory is that something very large caused this atmospheric distortion but was gone before I had a chance to look. Anyway this occurrence did not seem natural in any way. Ron-
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Frederick
There were no other sightings in Frederick on or around November 16th 2009
Summary: Three round clouds making a perfect triangle in the middle of a starry sky.
